title: Zz'rot portal now takes 5 hits to kill no matter what

replies.body: Why can't the 4th bullet just do 2 damage to wards? _Whyyyyy_

> [{quoted}](name=ViashinoWizard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEBHHi8W,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-23T04:27:29.387+0000)
>
> Why can't the 4th bullet just do 2 damage to wards? _Whyyyyy_

because its really really funny.
Not really...?
Science confirms that this is indeed hilarious
Tbh it actually sets Jhin up for ambushes.
Literally every assassin can ambush him during reloading and taking down pinks or Portals.
But not all assassins can sit stealthed next to him for a minute and then kill him slowly as he is unable to attack for 5 seconds.

You don't sit next to him,  you just attack him whenever he is doing so and people do sit around. To kill Jhin, all you need is a gap closer. I was talking about assassins who assassinate. Who the hell kills someone in minutes out of laning phase anyway?
{{champion:17}}
I traced the path of voidlings, and placed shrooms along the path. When enemies followed the voidlings to destroy the portal- I got an easy kill.

That's the point, they're the next evolution of the Yordle snap trap, the latest in psychopath hunting police tech.

Courtesy of Caitlyn, the *real* rift sniper.

Not a bad idea actually. Just make a universal change that crits count as two damage.

 {{champion:23}} rejoices!
{{champion:202}} WHY DOES THESE THINGS HATE ME?! *points at a {{item:2043}} & a {{item:3512}} gate* THEY DO NOT HAVE THE PERFECT NUMBER OF 4! WHY?!

don't forget 

{{item:3340}} {{item:2049}} is only 3

Which means the forth bullet can be used on someone more worthy
HE CAN MAKE MORE BEAUTY!
https://youtu.be/0LSekr8fQNc?t=3s
Now I can't sit and laugh as the enemy support spends 45s to kill my Zz'rot.

You can still do it when you build Banner against a Malphite though.

After 10 years, the Malphite finally kills the cannon. The crowd cheers.
{{champion:3}}

{{champion:34}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:8}} 

You're gonna have a bad time.
The promoted canon can be killed by other minions.
That's why you build a massive minion wave first! XD
Which Malphite will clear in no time

True, but so will some of the other mentioned Champions (Anivia, Karth, Vlad)

Still takes them forever to kill a Banner Cannon lmao

Meanwhile at Soraka's Daycare for very special ADCs..

{{champion:16}} Jhin, your parents tell me you've been counting to 4 a lot lately, lets try some other numbers next time, okay?

{{champion:202}} There are other numbers?

Jhin ends the game 4/4/4 with 44cs, 4 completed items and a stack of 4 health pots
{{champion:202}} 44/4/4 with 444cs and 4 {{item:3031}}
Beautyful.

> [{quoted}](name=Mauve Thunder,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HEBHHi8W,comment-id=001100000000,timestamp=2016-03-23T18:27:18.374+0000)
>
> Beautyfour.

ftfy
*ft4y

> {{champion:202}} There are other numbers? 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
And at the very end of the game when he is attacking the Nexus, he Qs a champ and the last hit hits a minion, giving him 45 cs

{{champion:202}} 5?

{{champion:202}} Reported for making up numbers.

Even though I love playing Jhin, I'm glad they made the change. I had to clear a portal with support Alistar a few days ago and oh god was it painful. It would've been faster to recall, sell all my items and buy AD, walk out there and kill it than to just sit there and punch it.

Jhin main here and I cry.

Considering late game I could easily 3-4 shot Zz'rot, this change huuuuurrrttssss
Graves?

ive had a game with a jhin he got the quadra and could have got the penta with one other AA but he walked away

4 was perfect, he didnt want to ruin it, i love whne people play the champion that deeply
{{champion:202}} -quardakill and sees the fifth- "WAIT don't move. I need to wait for the timer to expire." -offers some tea and cookies- "Snack?"
Meanwhile {{champion:96}} .....
{{champion:202}} They're toying with my OCD.. not cool Riot.. not cool.
meanwhile, every AP hero and every support and every tank: PARTY TIMEEEEEEEEEEE

{{item:2043}} {{champion:104}} **Screams internally**

Sees Zz'rot portal...

{{champion:104}} ** Commits suicide **

I don't like Jhin anyway. I mostly find him to be an annoyance at best. So yeah.

Also, Normal Wards = 3, ZZ'Rot = 5. {{champion:104}} **YELLS IN A MANLY FASHION** because not a multiple of 2.
Graves doesn't care, his E lets him get a +1 shot anyway.
{{champion:104}} you thought you had it bad
{{champion:104}} whyyyyyyyy
{{champion:104}} You think you got problems?
{{champion:104}} *_leaves to go cry in a corner_*
{{champion:96}} Time to Feast! {{champion:96}}

{{champion:1}}: Let's count to five!
{{champion:202}}: 1...2...3...4
